import'./style.css';import defaultProfileImage from'assets/image/default-profile-image.png';import dayjs from'dayjs';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";//          component: Comment List Item 컴포넌트          //

const getElapsedTime=()=>{const now=dayjs().add(9,'hour');const writeTime=dayjs(writeDatetime);const gap=now.diff(writeTime,'s');if(gap<60)return`${gap}초 전`;if(gap<3600)return`${Math.floor(gap/60)}분 전`;if(gap<86400)return`${Math.floor(gap/3600)}시간 전`;return`${Math.floor(gap/86400)}일 전`;};//          render: Comment List Item 렌더링          //
